name: AS_GCM_QNM_UT_updateQuestionFieldResponsesForSelectionBasedField
description: Used to update the responses of a selection based question (dropdwon, radio button, etc) for a given fieldKey
sail_code:
rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_updateQuestionFieldResponses(
  question: ri!question,
  fieldKey: ri!fieldKey,
  currentFieldResponses: rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_buildCurrentFieldResponsesForSelectionBasedQuestion(
    responseOptions: ri!question.responseOptions,
    selectedValues: ri!selectedValues,
    fieldKey: ri!fieldKey
  )
)
